name: Space Onheil
description:
Space onheil 

Space onheil is top down 2d shooter. Each time a random world will be generated for the player to explore in.  Your goal is to kill all the enemies on the planet and get back to your spaceship before your oxigen runs out.

This game was made by 2 people and some of the art was made by another person. It was a school project, we had 3 weeks to make a game. We put the game online after we got some download requests.

Note that this game is in early alpha and this is it's first release. Feel free to leave any comments on the game.

If you are currious about what is comming next follow our devlogs.
